name: Page Transitions w Animated Slider
description:
Here is my new desktop design concept for an portfolio site to help people all around the world see your work.

Project includes landing page, image slider, number slider, and smooth page transitions using smart animate when you select a project.


framer-motion library can achieve these transitions


Please feel free to include it into your projects


👉Comment below if you want to collab.

Smash the 🧡 button if you like it.

😏Follow for more amazing designs
